channel.title: Contribute on PrestaShop Developer Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Contribute on PrestaShop Developer Documentation

item.title: How to use GitHub to report an issue
item.description: How to use GitHub to report an issuePrestaShop uses GitHub to track bugs and issues. This is the best place to report the bugs you are witnessing on your PrestaShop shop. You need a free GitHub account to collaborate. If you don’t have one yet, you can create it here. Creating an issueTo create your first issue, go to the list of issues and click on the “New issue” button on the right.

item.title: How to test Pull Requests and branches
item.description: How to test Pull RequestsTests determine the quality of a software. This process involves evaluating information that is related to a shop. To make testing easier, we provide a Vagrant configuration designed for testing branches and pull requests. What is installed Debian 10 Buster Git Apache 2.4 Multiple PHP versions (7.1, 7.2, 7.3, 7.4) MariaDB 10 NodeJS RequiresFirst of all you need two tools to run this project: Vagrant VirtualBox If you’re using Windows, we recommend you to download Git bash and execute all commands under this shell.
